Food & Recipe Creator Programs

From Katheryn Eckles

Key Insights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Open vs. Curated Models: Whisk/Samsung Food, Recify, Instacart, and Amazon offer accessible entry for food creators that pass basic quality standards, while Mealime operates curated or professionally driven programs.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Monetization: Most platforms besides Mealime pay creators on either commission, per-view, hybrid, or revenue share; TikTok Shop, Instacart, and Amazon rely on affiliate/sales-driven payouts.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Content Moderation: All platforms combine automated tools and human oversight. Community flagging is common in open-access models.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creator Requirements: Micro-influencers frequently participate, but higher visibility and payout opportunities scale with audience and engagement quality. Only TikTok Shop requires a specific follower minimum (1,000).

Samsung Food (former Whisk)

Program Structure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * AI-powered platform for food and recipe discovery and personalization.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Over 160,000 recipes available; features custom meal planning, connected cooking (direct control of Samsung smart appliances), and social sharing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Users and creators can save recipes, make shopping lists linked to SKUs, and get personalized recommendations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Premium features: AI modification of recipes for dietary needs, vision AI (planned), Samsung Health syncing, and TV integration for recipe recognition from screen images.

Creator Requirements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Not focused on creators but more focused on customers saving recipes from all over the internet; however,  they do have a creator program for those who upload recipes directly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No formal minimum follower count; creators must publish original, clear, brand-aligned recipes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Creators can share, follow, and engage socially within the app.

Monetization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Creator Fund pays per recipe view and review; reported payout rates are $0.15/view and $0.50/review, with monthly minimums.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Additional affiliate commissions possible through shopping list integrations and partnered grocery retailers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Premium options for advanced search and recipe customization via monthly subscription ($7/mo).

Content Moderation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Combination of automated and human moderation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Editorial review for featured recipes and top contributors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Community flagging, structured guidelines for recipe clarity, safety, and suitability.

How can I trust a food influencer to provide great recipes?









Actionable steps

	1. Demonstrate Genuine Expertise

Why it matters: Users trust influencers who seem skilled, knowledgeable, and experienced with food.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Clearly state relevant expertise (e.g., culinary school, certifications, years of cooking experience).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Share behind-the-scenes processes: testing recipes, failed attempts, ingredient experiments.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Provide brief, helpful explanations of why certain ingredients or techniques work.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Show mastery through tutorials of foundational skills (e.g., knife skills, emulsifying sauces, dough handling).

	2. Build Authentic Social Proof

Why it matters: Users rely heavily on what other people say about a recipe before trusting it.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Feature comments, reviews, and user-generated photos (evidence the recipe works for many people).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Highlight number of people who have cooked the recipe (‚Äú15,000 people made this last month!‚Äù).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Encourage followers to leave honest reviews and share modifications.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Create a consistent hashtag so fans can easily browse real-world results.





	3. Prioritize Practical, Usable Content

Why it matters: Users trust recipes that feel easy, doable, and well-explained.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Keep recipes short, clear, and organized‚Äîavoid long stories before the ingredient list.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Include practical notes:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * substitutions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * storage tips

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * reheating instructions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * make-ahead options how to double/halve the recipe

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Be transparent about difficulty, time required, and equipment needed.





	4. Use High-Quality Visual Demonstrations

Why it matters: Users trust what they can see, especially through video.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Prioritize step-by-step videos‚Äîshow ingredients, techniques, textures, and common pitfalls.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Include close-ups of each stage of cooking to show realistic process and results.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Add captions that highlight important tips (e.g., ‚ÄúStop whisking when it looks like this!‚Äù).



	5. Make Identity and Values Clear

Why it matters: Shared identity or aspiration increases trust (social identity + halo effect).

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Share a concise story about your cooking style or philosophy (e.g., budget-friendly, healthy comfort food, cultural heritage).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Show personality and lifestyle without overshadowing recipe clarity.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Be authentic‚Äîdon‚Äôt lean solely on aesthetics or attractiveness as proof of expertise.



	6. Provide Transparency and Consistency

Why it matters: Consistency builds long-term trust.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Test recipes multiple times and say so explicitly.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Admit when something is imperfect or still being improved.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Be consistent in posting style, measurement units, and recipe formatting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Avoid partnerships that don‚Äôt align with your cooking values (e.g., promoting ingredients you never use).





	7. Showcase Community Learning

Why it matters: Comment sections are viewed as a ‚Äúgold mine‚Äù for users.

Actionable steps:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Pin top comments that include tips, modifications, or successful user results.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Respond to user questions so people see active, ongoing support.
